New Records: Lautaro Martinez is the leading goalscorer at the Copa America with four goals in three games
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martinez scored twice in the match
Argentina won the match 2-0 without Messi
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina's coach Lionel Scaloni watched from the stands as he served a one-match ban
Argentina made nine changes from the side which beat Chile 2-0 on Tuesday
Post-Match Reflections: Walter Samuel, Argentina's assistant coach, said that they have now used almost the whole squad and need to be ready for the next round

Jorge Fossati, Peru's head coach, said that Peru's performance was the weakest of all three games and that they couldn't see through their strategy due to the quality of Argentina and their physical condition
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina will face the runner-up in Group B, likely Mexico or Ecuador, in the quarterfinals on July 4
Peru is eliminated from the tournament
